verbs.description: I [V: do] n't know how often President Donald Trump goes to church , or if he kneels when he 's there . But maybe he should .
[ARG0: I] do [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: know] [ARG1: how often President Donald Trump goes to church , or if he kneels when he 's there] . But maybe he should .
I do n't know [ARGM-TMP: how often] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: goes] [ARG4: to church] , or if he kneels when he 's there . But maybe he should .
I do n't know how often President Donald Trump goes to church , or if [ARG1: he] [V: kneels] [ARGM-TMP: when he 's there] . But maybe he should .
I do n't know how often President Donald Trump goes to church , or if he kneels [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG1: he] [V: 's] [ARG2: there] . But maybe he should .
I do n't know how often President Donald Trump goes to church , or if he kneels when he 's there . But maybe he [V: should] .
